mapper.update:
UPDATE OM_ORG
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_type = #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_degree = #{orgDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_status = #{orgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_level = #{orgLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
guid_parents = #{guidParents,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_seq = #{orgSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_addr = #{orgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zipcode = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid_position = #{guidPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid_emp_master = #{guidEmpMaster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid_emp_manager = #{guidEmpManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_tel = #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
web_url = #{webUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=CHAR},
sub_count = #{subCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
mapper.sql: guid guid ,org_code orgCode ,org_name orgName ,org_type orgType ,org_degree orgDegree ,org_status orgStatus ,org_level orgLevel ,guid_parents guidParents ,org_seq orgSeq ,org_addr orgAddr ,zipcode zipcode ,guid_position guidPosition ,guid_emp_master guidEmpMaster ,guid_emp_manager guidEmpManager ,link_man linkMan ,link_tel linkTel ,email email ,web_url webUrl ,start_date startDate ,end_date endDate ,area area ,create_time createTime ,last_update lastUpdate ,updator updator ,sort_no sortNo ,isleaf isleaf ,sub_count subCount ,remark remark
